message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Thank you for showing me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $175. This is my best price for now.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. Let me see if I can adjust my budget accordingly. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $180. This is my best price for now.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I've reviewed my budget again and am willing to propose a price of $170 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $185. This is my best price for now.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered my budget and am willing to propose a final price of $175 for the product.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $190. This is my absolute minimum price for the product.
